import { connect } from 'react-redux' import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import { EpisodesCard } from '../../EpisodesCard/EpisodesCard' import { LocationCard } from '../../LocationCard/LocationCard' import s from './CharacterPage.module.scss' import {requestCharacter, requestEpisodes} from '../../../redux/main-reducer' import { Loader } from '../../UI/loader' const CharacterPage = ({character, requestCharacter,isFetching, episodes,}) => { const {charId} = useParams() const [allepisodes, setAllEpisodes] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { requestCharacter(charId) character.episode.ForEach(el => { const id = el.split('/').pop() setAllEpisodes(id) }) requestEpisodes(allepisodes) }, []); if(isFetching){ return( ) } return (
{console.log(character)}

{character.name}

{character.species}

Last known location:

{character?.location?.name}

Created:

{character.created}

Locations

Episodes

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) =>({ character: state.main.character, isFetching: state.main.isFetching, episodes: state.main.episodes }) export const CharacterPageContainer = connect(mapStateToProps,{requestCharacter})(CharacterPage)
